summary: There are almost 20 different styles, all purchasable from Vestia the Bikini Merchant across the street from Honningmead Brewery outside of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Bikinis
Author: Edhildil
4,4,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

[color=#a61c00][size=6]This Mod is Just For Fun. Not lore friendly. Most likely NSFW.[/size][/color]

Yep, I made a bikini mod. There are lots of these, please don't freak out.

The body is based on the shape of my DMRA mods from Oblivion.

It is not weighted for BBP, TBBP, or anything else. Weight mods distort this body so I removed that option so the breasts

won't turn into saggy, flopping cones.

There are almost 20 different styles, all purchasable from Vestia the Bikini Merchant across the street from Honningmead

Brewery outside of Whiterun. She has a Merchant booth there and hangs out with her three girlfriends. The bikinis are not

armor but they are ready for whatever enchantment you desire.

[color=#ffff00]I'm not going to convert this to another body type but someone else can if they want.[/color] There's plenty of bikinis for other

body types available on the Nexus and the web.


mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty
Statue: Edhildils Sevenbase Dibella statue

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]


Added a patch for those who want a different location. Install the patch after the main file.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)


 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_bikini folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_bikini folder
Delete Edhildils Bikinis Armor esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the body sculpting and bikini mesh
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2

Special thanks to Speedbuster AKA A_TYPE 2 for inspiration
Special thanks to those who have shown me support, your contribution is much appreciated.

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
